Package de.oth.blocklib

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.Configuration
public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
An instance of Configuration allows the framework to specify properties.
See Also:
Game

    Size of the Buffer around the array, which will be held in memory, but not be rendered.
    static int CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_HEIGHT
    Vertical Size of the array that is managed by the ChunkManager HAS TO BE an uneven value, so there's a distinct middle chunk
    static int CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_SIZE
    Horizontal Size of the array that is managed by the ChunkManager HAS TO BE an uneven value, so there's a distinct middle chunk
    static int CHUNK_SIZE
    Size of a single Chunk.
    static int CHUNKS_LOADED_ON_GPU_PER_FRAME  
    static long connectionAliveSendInterval
    Defines the time in milliseconds without any communication after which a keep alive packet is sent to let the receiver know this endpoint is still there.
    Set to 0 to disable sending keep alive packets.
    static long connectionAliveTimeout
    Defines the time in milliseconds without any communication after which a connection is considered dead.
    Set to 0 to disable checking for dead connections.
    static boolean CONSOLE_DEBUG
    Changes the behavior of the framework to output more debug information in the console.
    static float CUBE_SIZE
    Size of a single rendered Cube
    static java.lang.String customChunkSaveLocation
    if a custom path should be used to save chunks it should be defined here
    static float DAYTIME_DURATION
    Duration of a day in seconds.
    static int DEBUG_LEVEL
    The level of messages that will be logged.
    static boolean DECAY_STRUCTURES
    Can be used to toggle full structures or ruins, if structure generation is enabled.

    static boolean ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CHUNK_DISPLAY_REDUCTION
    dynamically reduces the size of CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_SIZE, to prevent low fps in hard to render areas Cannot be raised over the maximum of CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_SIZE (Compensates for Bad GPUs)

    Entity creation:

    Enables the generation of vegetation during the world generation.

    Enable weather changes

    • CHUNK_SIZE

      public static final int CHUNK_SIZE
      Size of a single Chunk. (total amounts of blocks in a chunk = n*n*n)
      HAS TO BE a power of 2 (8, 16, 32, 64, ...) or adjust calculations to use floating point numbers if using Octrees since Octrees always devide trough their center the octree node size won't stay an integer value at all levels
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_SIZE

      public static final int CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_SIZE
      Horizontal Size of the array that is managed by the ChunkManager HAS TO BE an uneven value, so there's a distinct middle chunk
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_HEIGHT

      public static final int CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_HEIGHT
      Vertical Size of the array that is managed by the ChunkManager HAS TO BE an uneven value, so there's a distinct middle chunk
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • CHUNK_ARRAY_BUFFERFRAME_SIZE

      public static final int CHUNK_ARRAY_BUFFERFRAME_SIZE
      Size of the Buffer around the array, which will be held in memory, but not be rendered. Be Careful with big numbers Value should be kept low
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CHUNK_DISPLAY_REDUCTION

      public static final boolean ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CHUNK_DISPLAY_REDUCTION
      dynamically reduces the size of CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_SIZE, to prevent low fps in hard to render areas Cannot be raised over the maximum of CHUNK_RENDER_ARRAY_SIZE (Compensates for Bad GPUs)

    • POSITION_EQUALITY_TOLERANCE

      public static final float POSITION_EQUALITY_TOLERANCE
      Two positions will never be exactly the same due to calculation and roundig inaccuracy. This value defines the maximum absolute difference of two values, that can still be considered to be equal.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • SHADOW_MAP_SIZE

      public static final int SHADOW_MAP_SIZE
      Size of the shadow map texture. Usually between 2048 and 8192, lower = faster. Can be lowered with smaller SHADOW_DISTANCE.

      public static final long connectionAliveTimeout
      Defines the time in milliseconds without any communication after which a connection is considered dead.
      Set to 0 to disable checking for dead connections.

      Constant Field Values

    • connectionAliveSendInterval

      public static final long connectionAliveSendInterval
      Defines the time in milliseconds without any communication after which a keep alive packet is sent to let the receiver know this endpoint is still there.
      Set to 0 to disable sending keep alive packets.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • acknowledgeFieldLength

      public static final int acknowledgeFieldLength
      \ Defines the length of the acknowledge field in bytes. The accept field contains a flag for each acknowledged packet and is used for the transmission of reliable packets.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

      public static int DEBUG_LEVEL
      The level of messages that will be logged. Compiling this and the booleans below as "final" will cause the compiler to remove all "if (Log.info) ..." type statements below the set level.

      public static java.lang.String guiFolder

    • STRUCTURES_DIRECTORY

      public static java.lang.String STRUCTURES_DIRECTORY
      Relative path to parent directory of .bs files to be used for structure generation.

    • ENABLE_CAVES

      public static boolean ENABLE_CAVES
      Can be used to toggle caves on and off. Not creating Caves saves performance.

    • ENABLE_VEGETATION

      public static boolean ENABLE_VEGETATION
      Enables the generation of vegetation during the world generation.

    • FOV

      public static float FOV
      Field of view, it the extent of the observable game world that is seen on the display at any given moment. Measured as an angle.

    • SHADOW_DISTANCE

      public static float SHADOW_DISTANCE
      Shadows are only drawn in front of this distance. Optimal Size = cos(FOV/2)*distanceBetweenPlayerAndEndOfLoadedChunks. Can be lowered to increase performance (try 1 to 100).

    • SHOW_SHADOW_MAP_FRAME

      public static boolean SHOW_SHADOW_MAP_FRAME
      Enables a UI frame that displays the shadow map.

    • SHOW_HEIGHT_MAP_FRAME

      public static boolean SHOW_HEIGHT_MAP_FRAME

    • SHADOW_MAP_FRAME_SIZE

      public static int SHADOW_MAP_FRAME_SIZE
      Sets the size of the shadow map frame. Usually 200 to 400.

    • HEIGHT_MAP_FRAME_SIZE

      public static int HEIGHT_MAP_FRAME_SIZE

    • showWireframe

      public static boolean showWireframe
      Used in the renderer to switch between rendering the cubes with texture or only the wireframe model.

    • runDemo

      public static boolean runDemo
      Used in the game class to switch between random delete / adding cubes every second.
      See Also:
      Game

    • mouseSensitivity

      public static float mouseSensitivity
      The speed of the mouse pointer and how fast it moves on the screen. With increased sensitivity, the camera moves faster and requires less effort to get across the screen. With a low mouse sensitivity, a camera moves slower and requires more effort to get across the screen, but offers better precision for users not familiar with a mouse.
      See Also:
      Camera

      public static boolean mouseInvert
      NOT USED AT THE MOMENT.

      the maximum velocity in any direction

      If set to true, FluidManager will add a lava fluid

      if set to true, will setup and render to attached HMD
